item.title: Creating a Bottom Sheet
item.description: In this post Simon KÃ¥gedal Reimer shows us how we can create a bottom sheet UI component using Swift, similar to the component used in the Apple Maps app.

item.title: Custom Label Effects in Swift 4
item.description: Anand Nimje shows us how to add some cool effects to our UILabel text using NSAttributedSting and Swift protocol extensions.
